item.description:
Wondering if you should attend Startup Weekend Storrs? Â Come out to the Info Session and learn all about why you should attend!

Learn all about how to:

  • make a perfect pitch
  • build a great team
  • apply lean startup methodologies to validate and build your minimum viable product
  • present to the judges

Startup Weekend is a global network of passionate leaders and entrepreneurs on a mission to inspire, educate, and empower individuals, teams and communities. Come share ideas, form teams, and launch startups!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be on the second floor in one of the larger classrooms
item.name: Startup Weekend Storrs: Info Session!
